page.title: 07ATTITUDES
page.content: A contrast is evident between the attitude prevalent in the two villages.{Alstone}has a strong community spirit.Most of the villages are known to each other and unite for all the annual festivities such as Harvest,Christmas , Summer fetes and sports.They work very hard for their own community,nurturing the young,caring for the old and calling little upon state aid. Teddington has less community spirit due to an influx of new families without roots in the village and whose leisure activities are largely catered for by their employers beyond the village.There are,still,older residents who remember the village before these changes occurred.
